data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of West Bay to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of West Bay, Cayman Islands
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of West Bay. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of West Bay to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in West Bay. Through your servants plant 2 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of West Bay
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of West Bay, West Bay, Cayman Islands.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of West Bay, Cayman Islands.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, help the 3,008 believers in West Bay to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.section_summary:
the state of West Bay, Cayman Islands has a population of 14,200.

We estimate West Bay has 3,008 people who might know Jesus, 8,621 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,570 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in West Bay, Cayman Islands to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
